There's no ntr here but we got 2 loss loves which built a new loving couple.

People in the comments not understanding what NTR is again. :/ This is light NTR as his childhood friend that he obviously loved was taken from him before he could start a romantic relationship with her. Her pulling him along the way she did in the beginning is suggesting she felt somewhat the same at that point(as this is the actions of any childhood friend that secretly loves her "friend" in any such story). People really need to stop thinking that NTR only pertains to actual couples...the genre has moved on to include POTENTIAL love interests of the MC, too...bonus points if the love interest also has feelings for the MC...or strongly implied.

That said, the NTR in this is light as MC moved on to another girl already...wish more NTR had this happen. Just wish there would have been another page of the childhood friend trying to pull him along again, only for his new girlfriend to bump her out of the way and take her place. Curious to see how the childhood friend would take it.
You can't miss what you never had. You only have one shot or it's game over.
